message:
Make The World Wonderful is an organization led by four 18 year old girls, with a vision  of a world where people live in harmony. 

Technology, IIT Kharagpur feels proud to entend its support to this wonderful cause, and stands by the core team of Make The World Wonderful, whose members have come to IIT Kharagpur to share their amazing journey with us.

Discover their journey: 
Venue: Kalidas Auditorium
Date: 29-08-2017
Time : 6:30 PM

The Annual Gymkhana Award Ceremony was held on the 18th of April at the Netaji Auditorium.

The ceremony saw the winners of the Gymkhana Awards in Technology, the 5th Inter IIT Tech Meet and the Technology General Championship being felicitated for their efforts and excellence.

The Technology Students' Gymkhana would like to congratulate all the awardees, and wishes them all the best for their future.
story: Technology, IIT Kharagpur added 50 new photos to the album: Gymkhana Awards 2016-2017 — with Anusha Sharan and Anmol Shakya.

message:
Following is the list of Gymkhana Awardees in the Technology category for the academic session 2016-2017.

The Technology Students’ Gymkhana would like to show its appreciation and thank these individuals for their immense and invaluable contribution to the student body and the institute, by felicitating them during the Annual Gymkhana Award Distribution Ceremony.

Following is the list of Gymkhana Awardees in the Technology category for the academic session 2016-2017.

The Technology Students’ Gymkhana would like to show its appreciation and thank these individuals for their immense and invaluable contribution to the student body and the institute, by felicitating them during the Annual Gymkhana Award Distribution Ceremony.

Following is the list of Gymkhana Awardees in the Technology category for the academic session 2016-2017.

The Technology Students’ Gymkhana would like to show its appreciation and thank these individuals for their immense and invaluable contribution to the student body and the institute, by felicitating them during the Annual Gymkhana Award Distribution Ceremony.

Gymkhana awards 2016 - 2017

Application for the gymkhana awards in the genre of technology are invited for
1) Prof. G S Sanyal Cup.
2) Order of merit.
3) Hon'ble mention.
4) Ashoke Mukherjee Cup (Outgoing student who has made outstanding voluntary contribution to the Gymkhana)
CVs should be emailed to tech.gymkhana@gmail.com by 11/04/2017 at 6 pm. All the relevant documents (supporting points mentioned in the CV) should be mailed along with the CV.
In the resumes following information can be included:
*Participation in the GC.
*Position of responsibilities.
*Participation in tech events (eg. KTJ, out station participation).
*Inter IIT Tech achievements. 
*Meaningful projects and technical papers.
*National/International conferences.
Regards

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur is conducting Open IIT Code Conclave with CodeChef on 9th April. The details are mentioned here - (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mvS6uhweW0u5G9ItWUaUTf3CvyqITRL69ibjjymRx3I/edit?usp=sharing).Please mail your usernames to codeconclave@gmail.com before Friday 11:45 PM.Exciting goodies for the top 10 students!!

Technology, IIT Kharagpur shared Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur's photo. The Problem Statement of Open IIT IoT is released. Check the link for the problem statement and other event related details: goo.gl/ygeDo7 Report Submission Date: 11th April, 8 pm (Mail to: openiitiot@gmail.com with subject "*Team Name* - Submission") Presentation Date: 14th April, time to be announced soon Register your team at: goo.gl/TWL0YR before 7th April, 8 pm

AFTER THE HUGE SUCCESS OF NAVARACHANAA 2016
We are back to have the same technical blast as we had done in the 2016.
So here we introduce the National level project competition
*NAVARACHANAA-2017* from* 30th March, 2017* to *31st March, 2017 *with
themes,
1) Digital India 
2) Make in India
3) Skill India/ Startup India
4) Smart city
5) Swachh Bharat Abhiyan
6)General Category
We are glade to invite you for this phenomenal opportunity to showcase your
ideas and Implementation as a cherishing outcome in the contribution to the
Nation's Dream.
For further Details:-
navarachanaa@svvv.edu.in
